com.amazon.carbonado.repo.dirmi

Interface RemoteStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface RemoteStorage
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Remote storage definition which does not actually extend the Storage interface. Client class is responsible for adapting Storage calls to RemoteStorage calls.

    Note: All access to Storable and Query objects is inlined. There is no reason to make them remote objects as that would add unnecessary latency. Most operations on Storables and Queries can be performed locally.

    Author:
    Brian S O'Neill
